ios-vanilla.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -project project/ios/project.xcodeproj -scheme project -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath project/ios/build -quiet -UseModernBuildSystem=NO
ios-vanilla.name: iPhone 7

ios-cocoapods.build: export RCT_NO_LAUNCH_PACKAGER=true && xcodebuild -workspace project/ios/project.xcworkspace -scheme project -configuration Release -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath project/ios/build -quiet -UseModernBuildSystem=NO
ios-cocoapods.name: iPhone 7
